NK041(di)010:0: rten gsar bzhengs kyi a rga'i cho ga /
NK041(di)010:3: mchod pa bshams sangs rgyas dang byang sems thams cad der spyan drangs /
NK041(di)010:4: rten gsum gang 'dod pa rgya cher 'byung ba'i gsol ba btab /
NK041(di)010:5: pu sti'i gzhi shog skya ras gazhi'am /
NK041(di)010:6: zangs sogs rgyu rnams kyi mdun du mchod pa bshams /
NK041(di)010:8: gzhi de dag gi steng du sangs rgyas byang sems
NK041(di)010:9: thams cad spyan drangs mchod pa phul rten 'di lta
NK041(di)010:10: bu byin gyis rlob par gsol ba btab /
NK041(di)010:11: mchod pa dang gtor ma btang /
NK041(di)010:12: sku thams cad byin gyis brlab par bsam /
NK041(di)010:14: bzo bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i skur bsgom /
NK041(di)010:15: sku gsung thugs su byin rlabs byas la gzhag pa mdor bsdus pa'o //
